mapper.insert: insert into FUNCTION_DARK_PERIOD (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, VALIDTIME, INVALIDTIME, BANKNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, RELATIVETYPE, BANKNAME ) values (#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invalidTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, VALIDTIME, INVALIDTIME, BANKNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, RELATIVETYPE, BANKNAME from FUNCTION_DARK_PERIOD
